oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1946-mm-dd (Tex Ritter, Dennis Moore, Coleen Summers guest) - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of All Star Western Theatre radio program. Broadcast date unknown, however it is announced that the guest the following week will be Johnny Mack Brown, suggesting a date of October 13, 1946, though another disc exists labeled with that date (see TR000687 and TR000688 ). Other possible broadcast dates are August 4 or August 25 of 1946 (unconfirmed). Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Cottonseed Clark, host Montie Montana, and guests Tex Ritter, Dennis Moore, and Coleen Summers.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Coleen Summers; Tex Ritter; Dennis Moore
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play 'Billy The Kid' [continued from part 1] -- Montie Montana thanks Dennis Moore and Tex Ritter -- Montie Montana introduces Cottonseed Clark -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Tex Ritter -- You Will Have To Pay (Tex Ritter) -- Cottonseed Clark and Tex Ritter talk -- Weber's Bread commercial (Ed Chandler) -- Cottonseed Clark introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Ridin' Down To Santa Fe (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Cottonseed Clark talks -- Where The Mountains Meet The Sky (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, Coleen Summers) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Cottonseed Clark)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: All star western theatre (Radio program); Clark, Cottonseed; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Montana, Montie; Ford, Mary, 1924-1977; Moore, Dennis, 1908-1964; Dean, Jimmy; Ritter, Tex
